definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
Gongsun Long (c. 325-250 BC), leading thinker of the School of Logicians of the Warring States Period (475-220 BC)
Gongsun Qi (-258 BC), famous general of Qin 秦國|秦国, the victor at 長平|长平 in 260 BC/same as Bai Qi 白起

sentences.english: Gong was very satisfied with the new follower.
sentences.chinese: 公孫龍對這個新收的門客非常滿意。

sentences.english: Not long afterwards, Gongsun and his followers went on a journey.
sentences.chinese: 沒過多久，公孫龍和他的門客一起出外遊玩。

sentences.english: His good friend Gongsun Chujiu was willing to help him , too.
sentences.chinese: 趙盾的好朋友公孫杵臼也願意幫助他。

sentences.english: Some days later, Gongsun Long and his followers went on a trip.
sentences.chinese: 沒過多久，公孫龍和他的門客一起出外遊玩。

sentences.english: There are many different interpretations of Gongsun Longs"White Horse Theory".
sentences.chinese: 有關公孫龍子的《白馬論》的解釋，歷來分歧很大。

sentences.english: Gongsun Long told his new disciple to prove his talent.
sentences.chinese: 公孫龍着令新弟子施展其技。

sentences.english: Some days later, Gong and his followers went on a trip.
sentences.chinese: 幾天以後，公孫龍和他的幾個朋友去旅行。

sentences.english: Gongsun Long took the man as his disciple.
sentences.chinese: 於是公孫龍收那人做徒弟。

sentences.english: Gong sun Long , is a famous scholar lived in the State of Zhao during the Warring States Period (475-221BC).
sentences.chinese: 戰國時期，趙國有位名士叫公孫龍。

sentences.english: Let GongSunFu sorrow cry is also pretend not to hear.
sentences.chinese: 任憑公孫夫憂呼喊亦是裝做沒有聽到。

sentences.english: Gongsun Hong also came from a poor family. Even at age fifty, he still herded pigs for others to support himself.
sentences.chinese: 公孫弘家境也很窮，一直到五十歲，還爲人放豬度日。

definition: Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
Minister of War (official title in pre-Han Chinese states)/two-character surname Sima
to cater to sb to make them happy (esp. of one's parents)
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu 班固[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls
Ma Chao (176-222), general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
old anecdote/stories passed on from former times
